__e: I want to see Carlo and my little girl one last time.
Fine, why don't you call the police, Carlo, and while you're at it, why don't you tell them what happened 19 years ago?
I didn't hurt Carlo, and I didn't kill that girl.
Carlo isn't here, he's with dad.
Miss Belle, we're about to do our "Around the World" number but Monte Carlo can't find her dice.
Speaking of balls, Carlo... Mine are where they belong.
